32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It is narrated on the authority of 'Abdullah that a woman was found killed in one of the battles fought by the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). He disapproved of the killing of women and children

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ قَتْلِ النِّسَاءِ وَالصِّبْيَانِ فِي الْحَرْبِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of killing women and children in war
